ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation of surface or line is measured on an outcrop of that surface or line directly, e.g. by measuring a particular bedding surface, a 3-D exposure of a fold hinge, a particular stretched mineral grain in a foliation surface. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:measure_on_outcrop
ControlledConcept.name: Measure on outcrop

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation measured using compass or other instrument directly on or at an outcrop of the structure. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:standard_on_site_measure
ControlledConcept.name: Standard on site measure

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation of a surface is measured by visually averaging across one or more outcrops in a small area--e.g. approximating dip by looking down strike of beds, approximating strike by outcrop trace of one or more beds. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:visual_surface_estimation_on_outcrop
ControlledConcept.name: Visual surface estimation on outcrop

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation determined by fitting a plane to three or more points located on the geologic surface of interest. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:three_point_determination
ControlledConcept.name: Three point determination

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation value is specified using a calculated average of a collection of related orientations (computer generalization). Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:calculated_average_orientation
ControlledConcept.name: Calculated average orientation

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation of a geologic structure estimated based on inspection or measurements on an air photograph. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:estimate_from_air_photo
ControlledConcept.name: Estimate from air photo

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation of a geologic structure based on observation from a distance great enough to preclude direct inspection of the structure to determine orientation. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:estimate_from_distance
ControlledConcept.name: Estimate from distance

ControlledConcept.gml:description: Orientation determined based on measurements from aerial photography or satellite imagery (in conjunction with an elevation model. Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:photogeologic_determination
ControlledConcept.name: Photogeologic determination

ControlledConcept.gml:description: use value qualifier to specify the kind of nil Source: this vocabulary
ControlledConcept.gml:name: urn:cgi:classifier:CGI:DeterminationMethod_orientation:200811:method_unknown
ControlledConcept.name: Method unknown
